快開季了，還未買到猛人，但利撚說：「不緊要，羅渣士加上謝隊領軍，第時有歐聯你慌無人？」

結果，利記拎了一年第二，之後蘇七同謝隊都走了。利迷發覺好多球隊都愈來愈強，花好多錢增兵拎好成績。利記依然百無，但利迷說：「不緊要，炒左羅渣士換上高普，係球隊大展拳腳嘅時候，亦係利迷打丁生活嘅開始！」

利迷日丁夜丁，兩年過去了，依然無冠。但利迷終於達成了心願，利記排在英超第四位 － 取得歐聯入場券。

利迷日等夜等，開始疑惑：「點解球隊已經有歐聯，但仲係買唔到人？」更令他驚訝的是，英超不少球隊都買到勁人猛人，但那些球隊比利記排名低喎。點解？唔係努力踢波入到歐聯就買到人嘅咩？

不知不覺轉會窗已經過了一半，利記已無什麼目標，利迷一日又一日渡過苦悶嘅七月同八月。

八月一日了，利迷孤零零坐在屋企睇利POST，回想前塵：「利記曾得過什麼？奪冠是怎麼樣的？駛一億簽到BIG NAME嘅滋味係點架？以前不是經常留帖話：『第時有歐聯你荒無人咩！』我照做了，究竟什麼地方出錯？」

Expanding on the roles of some of the members of the coaching staff, Klopp explained how each individual’s strengths and expertise combined provide him with a powerful support structure and assist his management of the Reds.

He continued: “Zeljko [Buvac] is the brain, Pete [Krawietz] is the eye. Pep [Lijnders] has become unbelievably important in a short time because he writes everything down, he is also part of ‘the brain’ because he is our mind to remember the things what we did in previous sessions.

“He brings us the next coaching generation; we are not old but we are already that long in the business, so it’s normal that you have routines, you use them and they are good. We try to stay open all the time, but with Pep he is our connecting point to the present and the future, so that’s really, really important.

“What can I say about John [Achterberg]? I’ve never met a guy like him! He is a goalkeeper coach 24 hours a day! That’s not always nice, actually, because if you want to talk to him about anything else, he can lead every conversation in a goalkeeping direction. That’s a skill, I think! In the end you think ‘Did we speak for five minutes about goalkeepers when we started with politics?’

To win the league, historically, you almost certainly need to concede less than 40 goals.

LFC have conceded 40+ in the last 7 seasons.

League winner's average (past 5 seasons)= 36 goals conceded.

LFC average= 46

Klopp's first full season= 42

A top CB is a game changer.

Structurally, we defend pretty well as a team. We concede a lot from poor concentration or individual errors. Solution? Better individuals.

So, it's difficult to see how this changes if we go into the season with Matip, Lovren, Klavan & Gomez. Van Dijk is essential.
